name: Sheep Doggo
description:
Use your dog to guide your sheep back to the pen.

An entry for the GDevelop Game Jam #2. 

 Controls:

Arrow keys to move left/right.
Space to jump.
X key to bark.

Get all sheep to safety (they drown if they get into water, so keep them safe all the time).

Credits:

Music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org

Font by Kenney.nl
